verses.roman:
ei ta' saṅkṣepe āmi kailuṅ upadeśa
svarūpera ṭhāñi ihāra pāibe viśeṣa

synonyms: ei—this; ta'-certainly; saṅkṣepe—in brief; āmi—I; kailuṅ upadeśa—have given instruction; svarūpera ṭhāñi—from Svarūpa Dāmodara; ihāra—of this instruction; pāibe—you will get; viśeṣa—all details.
translation: "I have briefly given you My instructions. Now you will get all details about them from Svarūpa Dāmodara.
